item.description: June's FIFTH WEDNESDAY Community Event will be an outdoor get together at one of the Trustees of Reservations properties managed by our very own Josh Knox. It's on the borderline between Holyoke and Springfield, MA. You and your family are welcome to attend! This will be an open, bring a dish to pass and have some grilled stuff MeetUp. We will probably take a small amount of time to check in with one another and introduce ourselves, but this is a wide open evening for relaxation and connection in community, right down by the Connecticut River. We will meet at the Jones Ferry Boathouse directly off Rte 5 by the Sisters of Mercy Hospital in Holyoke, MA (plenty of parking) and then walk in to the conservation property. Follow the Link for a map. [http://maps.google.co...]

group.name: Open Men's Group - Personal Mastery Workgroup

item.name: Build Community with Friends & Family!
